column3: Damage from all attacks is ignored unless they are battlecry attacks
Whenever an adjacent card performs a battlecry, it may perform it again for an additional +1 damage
When an adjacent card takes damage, all other cards adjacent to this card take that much damage
At the beginning of each turn if the active player controls all adjacent creatures, [Claim] this card
Cards adjacent to this card are adjacent to adjacent cards
In the case of a [Rumpus], this card will always be the core regardless of chunk size
When this card enters play, [Eject] all other cards
If a card would swap position with this card, it takes 2 [Hurt] and is [Ejected]
Whenever an adjacent card takes damage and is not defeated, swap its position with this card.
When any card moves into this card's position, it takes 2 damage.
When any card enters the scrum [Replace] this card with that card.
Adjacent cards can not move away from this card
When this card enters play, [Scatter] all cards in play that have performed an attack this game
